name: Python Dev Container with uv, gh & Review Tools
onCreateCommand:
echo 'Attempting to install uv...' && \
curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && \

echo 'Attempting to install GitHub CLI (gh)...' && \
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y curl gpg && \
curl -fsSL https://cli.github.com/packages/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg | sudo dd of=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg && \
sudo chmod go+r /usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg && \
echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/githubcli-archive-keyring.gpg] https://cli.github.com/packages stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/github-cli.list > /dev/null && \
sudo apt update && \
sudo apt install gh -y && \

echo 'Attempting to install review tools with uv...' && \
sudo /home/vscode/.local/bin/uv pip install --system ruff mypy licensecheck && \

echo 'Checking installed tool versions...' && \
/home/vscode/.local/bin/uv --version && \
gh --version && \
ruff --version && \
mypy --version && \
licensecheck --help > /dev/null
